change_summary.what_changed: Download option changed from Windows to macOS
specific_changes: Download for Windows changed to Download for macOS

market_signals: Cursor is expanding its compatibility to more operating systems.
strategic_analysis.business_impact: The change may slightly impact the user experience for macOS users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the overall business.
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: Cursor is focusing on expanding its user base and improving user experience.
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The change may give Cursor a slight competitive advantage in terms of compatibility, but it is unlikely to be a major differentiator.

threats: Competitors may respond by also expanding their compatibility, reducing Cursor's competitive advantage.
key_findings: Cursor is expanding its compatibility to more operating systems.
opportunities: Cursor can further expand its user base by supporting more operating systems.
recommended_actions: Monitor user feedback and adjust the download options accordingly.
Consider expanding compatibility to other operating systems.

key_insights: Cursor is expanding its compatibility to more operating systems.
business_impact: The change may slightly impact the user experience for macOS users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the overall business.
competitive_implications: The change may give Cursor a slight competitive advantage in terms of compatibility, but it is unlikely to be a major differentiator.
